Chattanooga.Northside Presbyterian Church:
Northside Presbyterian Church is an historic Presbyterian church at 923 Mississippi Avenue in Chattanooga, Tennessee, affiliated with the Presbyterian Church USA.
The congregation was founded in 1886, and its first building was completed in 1888.
The church's current Greek Revival building, completed in 1916 at a cost of $30,000, was designed by Reuben Harrison Hunt. It is his only Greek Revival design in Chattanooga.
